robot_capabilities.duneRunner: Front-positioned wheeled robot with a strong grip. Can lift and stabilize the front side of long, heavy items. It can carry objects by working together with other robots.
robot_capabilities.shoreHauler: Rear-positioned carrier robot with synchronized movement. Supports and balances the trailing end of large beams during transport. It can carry obejcts.

robot_morphology.duneRunner: Payload: ~60 kg, Speed: 0–3.5 m/s, Weight: 40 kg, Size: 800 × 400 × 550 mm, Clamp Reach: 0.4 m, Stabilizers: Yes
robot_morphology.shoreHauler: Payload: ~60 kg, Speed: 0–2 m/s, Weight: 40 kg, Size: 1000 × 600 × 500 mm, Rear Clamp Arm: 0.3 m, Balance Mode: Active

task_specific_rules: a beam is 6000 mm long and weighs around 100 kg
